commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 icon-mood icon-positive-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Higher than Industry Revenue Growth</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">A higher-than-industry revenue growth represents increased potential for the company to increase their market share</div><p class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">Over the last 5 years, revenue has grown at a yearly rate of 21.56%, vs industry avg of 19.45%</p></div></div><div tag="normal" eventlabel="Clicked Financial Statement" class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 icon-mood icon-positive-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Increasing Market Share</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Market share is the percentage of an industry&#x27;s total sales going to a particular company. It gives a general idea of the size of a company v/s its competitors</div><p class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">Over the last 5 years, market share increased from 84.32% to 92.03%</p></div></div><div tag="normal" eventlabel="Clicked Financial Statement" class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 icon-mood icon-negative-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Lower than Industry Net Income</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Net income is equal to net earnings (profit) less expenses. This number is an important measure of how profitable the company is</div><p class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m Nevertheless, you can follow these steps to adjust your SIP: Cancel the existing SIP on tickertape app \u0026 then navigate to your UPI app (Google Pay, PhonePe etc) and cancel the existing mandate from the autopay/mandate section. Return to the tickertape app or website to start a new SIP"},{"header":"How does the mandate set-up \u0026 daily SIP work?","description":"The mandate will be set higher to avoid SIP transaction failures. The mandate amount represents the max value of transaction possible and not the actual deduction. The actual SIP deductions are as per the amount entered during the buy flow. A higher mandate allows for multiple SIPs, if needed, without the need to create new mandates. For daily SIPs, the first transaction will happen instantaneously but the subsequent daily transactions will begin after 2 business days as the mandate registration process takes time to complete"},{"header":"What happens to my gold in the unlikely event of SafeGold going into liquidation?","description":"The title of the gold clearly rests with you and the physical gold stored with Brink’s on your account is not an asset of SafeGold in any way. Further, SafeGold has appointed an independent trustee who has the authority to act on your behalf and to protect your interests. The trustee also verifies the quantity and purity of gold. Vistra Corporate Services has been appointed as Security Trustee by SafeGold. Vistra has the first and exclusive charge over your gold held in vaults which means it has a charge over the gold over other commercial creditors till the time of fulfillment of delivery to you. Therefore, any unlikely adverse event happening to SafeGold will not affect your right over the gold"},{"header":"How can I sell the gold?","description":"You can sell the gold owned by you by clicking on “Withdraw” under the Gold portfolio section. You can sell any amount of gold starting with a minimum of ₹ 5 to a maximum of the amount of gold owned by you. If you are selling for the first time, you would need to provide your bank account details. Please note that to prevent fraudulent activity and safeguard customers, any gold that is bought or received as gift must be held for 24 hours before it can be sold. The money will be credited on the next business day from the sell transaction day"},{"header":"Can I take physical delivery of gold?","description":"Yes, visit www.safegold.com and login/register using the same mobile no. you use for logging in to Tickertape.
